Burton Island Burton Island | Knight Island | Knight Point | Lake Carmi | Niquette Bay | Underhill Woods Island NORTHWEST Vermont State Parks offers a wide variety of hiking opportunities. Whether you're looking for an easy, family-friendly hike or searching for outstanding views from a summit hike, or something in between, there is a trail nearby waiting for you. Here is our list of hiking trails for some ideas. Click on each map for a detailed description of the hiking available at that park or print out our Hiking Trails PDF for an easy-reference guide to all of our hiking trails.
